it.emarolab.sit

Interface SITBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Cone, Cylinder, GeometricPrimitive, Orientable, Plane, SceneIndividualDescriptor, SceneRepresentation, SpatialAtom, SpatialObjectPropertyDescriptor, SpatialRelation, SpatialSimplifier, Sphere, Test

    public interface SITBase
    The base interface for the SIT architecture.

    This interface is aimed to be a container for static methods and constants, as well as logging facility. It should be implemented by all classes of this architecture

    File: it.emarolab.sit.SITBase
    Licence: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
    Author: Buoncompagni Luca (luca.buoncompagni@edu.unige.it)
    affiliation: EMAROLab, DIBRIS, University of Genoa.
    date: 05/06/17

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SITBase.CLASS
      The interface containing all the constants related to classes.
      static interface  SITBase.DATA_PROPERTY
      The interface containing all the constants related to data properties.
      static interface  SITBase.INDIVIDUAL
      The interface containing all the constants related to individuals.
      static interface  SITBase.OBJECT_PROPERTY
      The interface containing all the constants related to object properties.
      static interface  SITBase.VOCABOLARY
      The base interface for the SIT constants.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
      The threshold of the recognition confidence [0,1] to consider a scene different enough (from the best recognition) to be learned.
      static java.lang.String ONTO_FILE
      The path to the main t-box ontological representation used by the SIT algorithm, with respect to the src folder.
      static java.lang.String ONTO_IRI
      The IRI domain of the main t-box ontological representation used by the SIT algorithm.
